live_updates: This Issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.

30385.summary: Some customers in Teulon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30385.title: Dec 12 – Teulon | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
